rules_mdDesc:
Organization - Session Policy gives visibility on access permissions related to Session Timeout, Enforce login IP ranges on every request.

This violation means that there is conflict with your policy for these settings.

Compliant Solution

Review this configuration. If the permissions are acceptable, you can change the status to Safe.
When marked safe, this issue will only show up again if one of the other policy rules in this set are violated. You can review what has been marked as safe at any time using the filters at the top of the page.

See

  • MITRE, CWE-284 - Improper Access Control
  • OWASP Top 10 2021 Category A01 â€“ Broken Access Control
